shadowverse:Paracelise.DESCRIPTION: Festive. NL Deal !D! damage and discard 3 random cards. NL Invocation: At the end of your turn, if you have no cards in your hand, add this card to your hand, gain !B! Block, heal !M! HP, deal !M! damage to all enemies and draw 1 additional card next turn.

shadowverse:ArcticChimera.NAME: Arctic Chimera
shadowverse:ArcticChimera.DESCRIPTION: Accelerate 0: Earth_Rite: Deal !D! damage and draw 1 card. NL NL --------------------- NL NL Gain !B! Block 2 times. NL Earth_Rite 3: 3 times instead. Then, deal damage equal to your Block. NL If your Earth_Essence are less than 3, gain 2 and apply 2 Vulnerable.

shadowverse:EternalContract.NAME: Eternal Contract
shadowverse:EternalContract.DESCRIPTION: Festive. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard !M! cards.

shadowverse:Lifetime.NAME: Story of a Lifetime
shadowverse:Lifetime.DESCRIPTION: Festive. NL Discard 1 card and draw !M! cards. NL If you've drawn 15 or more cards this combat, draw 2 more.

shadowverse:TriggerPuppeteer.NAME: Trigger-Happy Puppeteer
shadowverse:TriggerPuppeteer.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Add !M! *Puppet(s) to your hand.

shadowverse:WhiteEagleBaptism.NAME: White Eagle Baptism
shadowverse:WhiteEagleBaptism.DESCRIPTION: Randomly add 1 *Holy *Falcon or *Regal *Falcon to your hand. NL Countdown 2: Add the other card to your hand.
shadowverse:WhiteEagleBaptism.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Randomly add 1 *Holy *Falcon+ or *Regal *Falcon+ to your hand. NL Countdown 2: Add the other card to your hand.

shadowverse:Faker.NAME: Deceptive Shapeshifter
shadowverse:Faker.DESCRIPTION: When this card is discarded, Vengeance becomes active until the end of your turn. NL If Vengeance is active, gain 1 Strength and Dexterity for each non-Strike Attack card played this turn. NL Ethereal.
shadowverse:Faker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When this card is discarded, Vengeance becomes active until the end of your turn. NL If Vengeance is active, gain 1 Strength and Dexterity for each non-Strike Attack card played this turn.

shadowverse:RoomServiceDevil.NAME: Room Service Demon
shadowverse:RoomServiceDevil.DESCRIPTION: Accelerate 0: Discard 1 card and deal !M! damage. NL NL --------------------- NL NL Deal !D! damage. If there are 2 or less cards in your hand, deal that damage again and gain !B! block.

shadowverse:JubilanceWitch.NAME: Jubilance Witch
shadowverse:JubilanceWitch.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Earth_Essence. NL Then, if your Earth_Essence are more than 3, deal !D! damage to all enemies.

shadowverse:AcidGolem.NAME: Acid Golem
shadowverse:AcidGolem.DESCRIPTION: Earth_Rite: Deal !D! damage. NL Earth_Rite 2: Repeat 1 time. NL Earth_Rite 3: Repeat 2 times.

shadowverse:Comfort.NAME: Illusions of Comfort
shadowverse:Comfort.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card in your hand and deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, increase yor max HP by !M!. NL Exhaust.
